creator: Rajeshwer Infotech
descriptionHtml:
Garment Mandi aspires to be the preferred garment trading solutions provider in India, that offers warehousing as well as processing offices located in each manufacturing hub for dispatching and product uploading. We have eliminated the middle man cost by providing an online platform where the garment manufacturers located across India may sell their products directly to genuine and verified retailers or wholesalers throughout India, without any additional cost.

Garment Mandi is the biggest online garments trading platform that provides highly effective tools and a cost effective platform for brand promotion and image building in the textile industry. Also, the garment retailers can source their latest products directly from the manufacturer seamlessly, without any extra cost.

India is a hub for garment manufacturing with large manufacturing units in Delhi, Ludhiana, Kolkata, Mumbai, Ahmadabad, Kanpur and Tirupur. For a buyer, sourcing products from the best manufacturer among the thousands of manufacturers that are available, or to find the right product at the right price is a tough and expensive job. For a seller, selling products to remote parts of India is a tedious work. With Garment Mandi, all your buying and selling problems are solved. Now, you don't have to settle for the second best products available at a premium price, or limit the market of your product, or depend upon commission agents or wholesalers who bound the scope of your products and charge exorbitant prices. We provide you products at manufacturer price and throw in some extra discounts and added benefits so that you get the best product at minimum price. we guarantee minimum price for each listed product .

We have sales office in each of the manufacturing hub in India, where you can do offline purchasing also , our sales experts assist you in finding the right product at each locations and you can physically see all the listed items.
Our sales team makes sure that all manufacutrer listing is updated on daily basis, the payment is made as per agreed terms and the goods are delivered on time. For your convenience, we pick orders from your doorstep and deliver it to the customers. We also runs 360 degree campaigns so that your product can get the right exposure. Our regular customers can avail the benefit of credit facility which depends on the number of successful transactions made by them in a given period of time with us and as per their individual financial assessment.

Garment Mandi is here for you! Purchase the garments of your choice at comparable and cheap prices without any hassle, at single platform. We are committed to excellence in customer service and forging strategic partnerships by increased connectivity between buyers and sellers. Our passionate approach facilitates the achievement of our vision of becoming your day to day business tool for enhancing your enterprise.

India is a hub for garment manufacturing with large manufacturing units in Delhi, Ludhiana, Kolkata, Mumbai, Ahmadabad, Kanpur and Tirupur. For a buyer, sourcing products from the best manufacturer among the thousands of manufacturers that are available, or to find the right product at the right price is a tough and expensive job. For a seller, selling products to remote parts of India is a tedious work. With Garment Mandi, all your buying and selling problems are solved. Now, you don't have to settle for the second best products available at a premium price, or limit the market of your product, or depend upon commission agents or wholesalers who bound the scope of your products and charge exorbitant prices. We provide you products at manufacturer price and throw in some extra discounts and added benefits so that you get the best product at minimum price. we guarantee minimum price for each listed product .

descriptionHtml:
Garment Mandi aspires to be the preferred garment trading solutions provider in India, that offers warehousing as well as processing offices located in each manufacturing hub for dispatching and product uploading. We have eliminated the middle man cost by providing an online platform where the garment manufacturers located across India may sell their products directly to genuine and verified retailers or wholesalers throughout India, without any additional cost.

Garment Mandi is the biggest online garments trading platform that provides highly effective tools and a cost effective platform for brand promotion and image building in the textile industry. Also, the garment retailers can source their latest products directly from the manufacturer seamlessly, without any extra cost.

India is a hub for garment manufacturing with large manufacturing units in Delhi, Ludhiana, Kolkata, Mumbai, Ahmadabad, Kanpur and Tirupur. For a buyer, sourcing products from the best manufacturer among the thousands of manufacturers that are available, or to find the right product at the right price is a tough and expensive job. For a seller, selling products to remote parts of India is a tedious work. With Garment Mandi, all your buying and selling problems are solved. Now, you don't have to settle for the second best products available at a premium price, or limit the market of your product, or depend upon commission agents or wholesalers who bound the scope of your products and charge exorbitant prices. We provide you products at manufacturer price and throw in some extra discounts and added benefits so that you get the best product at minimum price. we guarantee minimum price for each listed product .

We have sales office in each of the manufacturing hub in India, where you can do offline purchasing also , our sales experts assist you in finding the right product at each locations and you can physically see all the listed items.
Our sales team makes sure that all manufacutrer listing is updated on daily basis, the payment is made as per agreed terms and the goods are delivered on time. For your convenience, we pick orders from your doorstep and deliver it to the customers. We also runs 360 degree campaigns so that your product can get the right exposure. Our regular customers can avail the benefit of credit facility which depends on the number of successful transactions made by them in a given period of time with us and as per their individual financial assessment.

Garment Mandi is here for you! Purchase the garments of your choice at comparable and cheap prices without any hassle, at single platform. We are committed to excellence in customer service and forging strategic partnerships by increased connectivity between buyers and sellers. Our passionate approach facilitates the achievement of our vision of becoming your day to day business tool for enhancing your enterprise.

India is a hub for garment manufacturing with large manufacturing units in Delhi, Ludhiana, Kolkata, Mumbai, Ahmadabad, Kanpur and Tirupur. For a buyer, sourcing products from the best manufacturer among the thousands of manufacturers that are available, or to find the right product at the right price is a tough and expensive job. For a seller, selling products to remote parts of India is a tedious work. With Garment Mandi, all your buying and selling problems are solved. Now, you don't have to settle for the second best products available at a premium price, or limit the market of your product, or depend upon commission agents or wholesalers who bound the scope of your products and charge exorbitant prices. We provide you products at manufacturer price and throw in some extra discounts and added benefits so that you get the best product at minimum price. we guarantee minimum price for each listed product .
